Package databases

Class appointmentQuery

java.lang.Object
databases.appointmentQuery
public class appointmentQuery extends Object
The appointmentQuery class updates, inserts, deletes data from the appointments table.

    • insertAppointment

      public static boolean insertAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, String start, String end, LocalDate date, int customerID, int userID, int contactID) throws SQLException
      The insertAppointment method inserts appointments into the appointment database while making sure data is in the right format, and their is no schedule conflict.
      Parameters:
      contactID - The contact ID.
      date - The date of appointment.
      description - The description of appointment.
      customerID - The customer ID.
      end - The end time of appointment.
      location - The location of the appointment.
      start - Start time of appointment.
      title - Title of the appointment.
      type - Type of appointment.
      userID - The userID.
      Returns:
      Returns true if their is no conflict and data is successfully entered into the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • updateAppointmentsDB

      public static boolean updateAppointmentsDB(int appointmentID, String appointmentTitle, String appointmentDescription, String appointmentLocation, String appointmentType, String startTimeDB, String endTime, LocalDate dateDB, int customerID, int userID, int contactID) throws SQLException
      the updateAppointmentDB updates appointments while also checking for time conflicts.
      Parameters:
      contactID - The contact ID.
      dateDB - The date of appointment.
      appointmentDescription - The description of appointment.
      customerID - The customer ID.
      endTime - The end time of appointment.
      appointmentLocation - The location of the appointment.
      startTimeDB - Start time of appointment.
      appointmentTitle - Title of the appointment.
      appointmentType - Type of appointment.
      userID - The userID.
      appointmentID - The id of the appoint to be deleted.
      Returns:
      returns true if the their is no conflict with another customer appointment.
      Throws:
      SQLException
